name: Color Jumper
description: Color Jumper is an abstract, color-based puzzle platformer which focuses on fast, precise movement to navigate your surroundings. Inspired by hardcore platformers like Super Meat Boy, Downwell, VVVVVV, and many others.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
